author: Bailey Long
text: Day 6: I have the WORST sunburn on the back of my legs so we spent the day shopping now it’s time to head home and i cant not wait to be home😴 although Hawaii did treat me right 😉I’ll definitely be back in a couple years!! https://t.co/J3ZXXnl9l7
